articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Figure

					Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Alexei Miler, general director of Gazprom of Russia. 
					
					Alexei Miler handed the gift to Kim Hui Yong, minister of Oil Industry of the DPRK who is on a visit to Russia, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Gift to Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a gift by the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					The floral basket and gift were handed to an official concerned by Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the Institute, on Saturday.

articles.title: Greetings to Chilean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Chilean President

					Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on September 13 sent a message of greeting to Sebastian Pinera Echenique, president of the Republic of Chile, on the 201st anniversary of its independence.
					
					Kim, in the message, wished the Republic of Chile prosperity, hoping that the Chilean president would achieve greater success in the work for the country's stability and its people's welfare.
